price: 27. Kaadu Nabii Ibraahimow, sinaamah cajjih seecaay iysixxig, ibaybaay luwa-le gaalih amot gexak koi amaatelon, kulli gitay xeerik luwal-le gaali ken baahak yamaaten usun Cajji abitaanamkeh kaak inne.
arabic: وَأَذِّن فِي ٱلنَّاسِ بِٱلۡحَجِّ يَأۡتُوكَ رِجَالٗا وَعَلَىٰ كُلِّ ضَامِرٖ يَأۡتِينَ مِن كُلِّ فَجٍّ عَمِيقٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-adhin fī al-nāsi bil-ḥaji yatūka rijālan waʿalā kulli ḍāmirin yatīna min kulli fajjin ʿamīqin
